aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.about1: Web Designer with 15 years of experience in Design (UI) and Development (Front-End) of Web portals. Throughout my career I have worked with brands such as CEMEX, TOYOTA, ITESM, UDEM, CABLEVISION, izzi Telecom, Tigres UANL, Grupo Xignux, C.F. Monterrey, envios.com and others.
aboutme.about2: Features, User Flows and Contents. User Experience, Prototypes, Graphic Design, Front-end Development in Web Applications for Corporate Websites.

aboutme.experience4: Websites Operation and Landing Pages Development.
aboutme.experience7: Operation of the WiFi advertising Portal of the BBVA Rayados Stadium.
aboutme.experience8: Operation and usability improvements to the CABLEVISION Portal with Oracle Web Center Sites.
aboutme.experience9: Redesign, Front-end coding and operation of FastForward and TELUM portals.
aboutme.experience10: Design and Layout for Microsites and Responsive Web Applications with Frameworks such as Foundation and Bootstrap.
aboutme.experience11: Design and Operation of CEMEX's Portals
aboutme.experience12: Design of the TIGRES UANL Portal.
aboutme.experience13: Operation of the UDEM Portal with Microsoft SharePoint.
